models

Class InputFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.InputFile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sorter

    public class InputFile
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class InputFile. Represents one inputfile as defined in konfiguration.xml (tag datei) uses flatpack for fixed length, i.e. Satzart-Files uses CSVReader for csv files returns value by column name
